channel.title: Dr James Uther
channel.description: Recent content on Dr James Uther

item.title: CV
item.description: Dr James Uther james.uther at gmail.com | @hemul The 1-powerpoint-slide version from work: James is a senior engineering lead in our Digital practice where he specializes in leading solutions to the most complex technical challenges. With over 25 years of technical and leadership experience across industries, technologies, and cultures, he is able to offer valuable insights to clients. “Technology is changing so fast and the part of my job I enjoy the most is tackling complex problems for clients.
